patthana16.23:5.1: Kusalaṃ bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.23:6.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.23:7.1: Abyākataṃ upādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.23:8.1: Kusalaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.23:8.4: Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pannarasa.
patthana16.23:9.1: Abyākataṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.23:9.2: Abyākataṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.23:9.3: Abyākataṃ upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupādinno ca naakusalo naupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
